Posts.EditableText: Complete noob here, I want to create a glass of wine, player can drink wine (once) but also keep the glass. I can create the verb drink but how do I make the wine in glass disappear/change the description in the inventory when they drink? Any help appreciated!

Posts.EditableText: You could have an empty cup object set to invisible in the players inventory. When you drink the cup of water set the empty to visible  and set full to invisible.
Posts.HTML: You could have an empty cup object set to invisible in the players inventory. When you drink the cup of water set the empty to visible and set full to invisible.
